Colorfle: Challenge yourself with Colorfle, a color mixing puzzle game. Mix and match colors to guess the target combination in 6 tries. Play free, no download needed!

ðŸŽ¨ Colorfle Unlimited is a color mixing puzzle game where you guess the target color combination in 6 attempts. Each guess provides feedback to help you understand how close you are to the target color mix. And you can play unlimited times with new challenges every time you refresh the page.

Intuitive Color Mixing Interface: Our unique circular display makes color mixing visual and intuitive. Watch as your color combinations come to life in real-time, helping you understand color theory through practical experimentation.
Progressive Learning System:Perfect for both beginners and experts, Colorfle's feedback system helps you gradually master the art of color mixing. Each attempt teaches you more about color relationships and mixing principles.
Unlimited Practice Mode: Enhance your color mixing skills with unlimited puzzles. Each refresh brings a new challenge, allowing you to experiment with different color combinations and perfect your mixing technique.

ðŸ¤” How does the color mixing system work?
The game uses a multi-color mixing system. Each color in your guess contributes to the final mix based on its proportion, shown by the sector size in the circular display. The closer your mix matches the target, the higher your accuracy score.

ðŸ§© What do the different feedback colors mean?
After each guess, you'll receive color-coded feedback:
- Green border indicates a perfect match for that color's position
- Yellow border shows the color is correct but in the wrong position
- No highlight means that color isn't part of the target mix
